original_title: Police Constable arrested for soliciting bribe
original_body_lines: A Police Constable attached to the Weligama Police was arrested by the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption (CIABOC) a short while ago (31 May).
Accordingly, the Constable in question was arrested by CIABOC officials for soliciting a bribe of Rs. 10,000.
